Dec. 5, 1908 D Blackpool Contest

The Amber Witch [arr. W. Rimmer]
Tower Circus, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 2nd annual Fylde BBA contest. March: 1. Blackpool Lifeboat, 2. Freckleton Subs. 7 bands competed.
May 29, 2014, 4:16 p.m. Sept. 24, 2018, 10:07 p.m.
1 Kirkham Subscription J. H. Boulton
2 Freckleton Band Peter Rawstrone
3 Blackpool South Shore Subscription W. E. Taylor
Unknown Result St. Annes on the Sea T. Lightbourne
Unknown Result Blackpool Lifeboat T. Wylie
